DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety two vaginal product compare placebo determine two product well placebo relief vaginal discomfort .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Two Vaginal Products Versus Placebo Patients With Vaginal Discomfort
